H0.text: In what race do cyclists follow a motorised pacer. Keirin

H1.text: In what race do cyclists follow a motorised pacer. Velodrome Racing

H2.text: In what race do cyclists follow a motorised pacer. Motorpace

H3.text: In what race do cyclists follow a motorised pacer. 競輪

A4.text: Motor-paced racing and motor-paced cycling refer to cycling behind a pacer in a car or more usually on a motorcycle.

A5.text: The keirin, a Japanese sprint with a paced start which has spread across the world, is a variation of motor-paced racing.
